column4: i got a widescreen running high resolution 1680x1050 on an ATI card, resolution is fine but everything is fuzzy on the screen
nothing, i made a full detailed post @ http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=589939
'fuzzy' is automatic for refresh rate issues.
all resolutions work fine, except this one (the highest)
and i tried everything in the monitor it self and go nothing, and attempted changing / modifying the vertical + horizontal sync in xorg.conf
maybe its a limitation of the driver under linux.
ask me in 10 days when my new laptop comes in that does high res.
ah, could be regression issue. Have you filed a bug in lp?
running gutsy now, ally my other computers work perfectly
waiting on some responses on the forum first, didn't find any related bugs
don't be shy about filing bugs.
yeah i guess i'll do that
